title: Unable to Select Any Item in Library Outline View at First Attempt
description:
Description: I am experiencing an issue where I am unable to select any item at the first attempt in the library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

OB: When I try to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: The focus should remain on the selected item in the library outline view when I click on it.
SR: 1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the outline view and ensure that the focus remains on the selected item.
Note: This issue occurs consistently and is reproducible on multiple attempts.
